title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Aircraft Transaction
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Aircraft Transaction 

Register Survey) Order 2024. 

(2) This Order shall cease to have effect on 1 February 2029.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited statistic (aircraft transaction register survey) order 2024 (2) order shall cease effect 1 february 2029

title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

“Regulations” means - 

(a) Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 27 November 20191, as amended by Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212, and 

(b) Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/1197 of 30 
July 20203, as amended by Commission 
Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2021/1225 of 27 July 20214, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2022/2552 of 12 December 20225 
and Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/1840 of 27 
June 20246; 

“survey” means the Aircraft Transaction Register Survey that is conducted by 
the Central Statistics Office in order to obtain information set out in Part 2 of the 
Schedule, including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulations. 

1 OJ L 327, 17.12.2019, p. 1. 
2 OJ L 339, 24.9.2021, p. 33. 
3 OJ L 271, 18.8.2020, p. 1. 
4 OJ L 269, 28.7.2021, p. 58. 
5 OJ L 336, 29.12.2022, p. 1. 
6 OJ L 2024/1840, 4.7.2024. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th December, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 (2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulations has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulations, except 
where the context otherwise requires. 

[722] 3

title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 3. This Order applies to a person -
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to a person - 

(a) 

engaged in, or 

(b) 

acting on behalf of a person engaged in, 

any transaction specified in Part 1 of the Schedule.
text_norm: 3 order applies person - (a) engaged (b) acting behalf person engaged transaction specified part 1 schedule

title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 4. (1) This Article applies on a particular date to a person to whom this Order
text_raw:
4. (1) This Article applies on a particular date to a person to whom this Order 
applies where, in the period of 24 months immediately preceding that date, on 
any day in that period, the person engaged in the purchase or sale of aircraft. 

(2) A requirement on persons to whom this Article applies - 

(a) 

subject to paragraph (b), to provide, for the purposes of the 
survey, information the general nature of which is specified in 
Part 2 of the Schedule in relation to each month in the period from 
1 January 2025 to 31 December 2028, and 

(b) 

to provide the information in relation to each month in the period 
referred to in paragraph (a), once only, 

is hereby prescribed. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [722]
text_norm: 4 (1) article applies particular date person order applies period 24 month immediately preceding date day period person engaged purchase sale aircraft (2) requirement person article applies - (a) subject paragraph (b) provide purpose survey information general nature specified part 2 schedule relation month period 1 january 2025 31 december 2028 (b) provide information relation month period referred paragraph (a) hereby prescribed 4 722

title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: Article 3
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Part 1 

Article 3 

Transactions to which Article 3 refers: 

(a) 

lease of aircraft; 

(b) purchase of aircraft; 

(c) 

sale of aircraft. 

Part 2 

Article 4
text_norm: schedule part 1 article 3 transaction article 3 refers (a) lease aircraft (b) purchase aircraft (c) sale aircraft part 2 article 4

title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the person concerned
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the person concerned 

and specifying the month and year to which the information relates: 

(a) 

the number of aircraft purchased by the person; 

(b) 

the number of aircraft sold by the person; 

(c) 

the value of aircraft purchased from each specified counterpart 
geography; 

(d) 

the value of aircraft sold to each specified counterpart geography; 

(e) 

the address and eircode of the registered office of the person and 
other locations where the business engaged in by the person is 
conducted from; 

(f) 

the business, trading or other name or names by which the person 
is known; 

(g) 

the description of the business engaged in by the person.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates person concerned specifying month year information relates (a) number aircraft purchased person (b) number aircraft sold person (c) value aircraft purchased specified counterpart geography (d) value aircraft sold specified counterpart geography (e) address eircode registered office person location business engaged person conducted (f) business trading name name person known (g) description business engaged person

title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: Information on the time taken by the person concerned to complete the
text_raw:
2. 

Information on the time taken by the person concerned to complete the 
questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director General for the 
collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 December, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach.
